verses.verse: אֵ֠לֶּה <WH428> These הַֽחֻקִּ֣ים <WH2706> These [are] the statutes וְהַמִּשְׁפָּטִים֮ <WH4941> and judgments אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which תִּשְׁמְר֣וּן <WH8104> which ye shall observe לַעֲשׂוֹת֒ <WH6213> to do בָּאָ֕רֶץ <WH776> in the land אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> which נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> giveth יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֧י <WH430> God אֲבֹתֶ֛יךָ <WH1> of thy fathers לְךָ֖ לְרִשְׁתָּ֑הּ <WH3423> thee to possess כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיָּמִ֔ים <WH3117> it all the days אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> you חַיִּ֖ים <WH2416> that ye live עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> upon the earth

אַבֵּ֣ד <WH6> Ye shall utterly תְּ֠אַבְּדוּן <WH6> destroy אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַמְּקֹמ֞וֹת <WH4725> all the places אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which עָֽבְדוּ־ <WH5647> served שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> in it הַגּוֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> wherein the nations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom אַתֶּ֛ם <WH859> you יֹרְשִׁ֥ים <WH3423> ye shall possess אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> their gods עַל־ <WH5921> and הֶהָרִ֤ים <WH2022> mountains הָֽרָמִים֙ <WH7311> upon the high וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on הַגְּבָע֔וֹת <WH1389> and upon the hills וְתַ֖חַת <WH8478> and under כָּל־ <WH3605> every עֵ֥ץ <WH6086> tree רַעֲנָן׃ <WH7488> and under every green

וְנִתַּצְתֶּ֣ם <WH5422> And ye shall overthrow אֶת־ <WH853> מִזְבּחֹתָ֗ם <WH4196> their altars וְשִׁבַּרְתֶּם֙ <WH7665> and break אֶת־ <WH853> מַצֵּ֣בֹתָ֔ם <WH4676> their pillars וַאֲשֵֽׁרֵיהֶם֙ <WH842> their groves תִּשְׂרְפ֣וּן <WH8313> and burn בָּאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> with fire וּפְסִילֵ֥י <WH6456> the graven images אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֖ם <WH430> of their gods תְּגַדֵּע֑וּן <WH1438> and ye shall hew down וְאִבַּדְתֶּ֣ם <WH6> and destroy אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמָ֔ם <WH8034> the names מִן־ <WH4480> that הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> of them out of that place הַהֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he
לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תַעֲשׂ֣וּן <WH6213> Ye shall not do so כֵּ֔ן <WH3651> like לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God

כִּ֠י <WH3588> for אִֽם־ <WH518> lo אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמָּק֞וֹם <WH4725> But unto the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יִבְחַ֨ר <WH977> shall choose יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֙ <WH430> your God מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all שִׁבְטֵיכֶ֔ם <WH7626> out of all your tribes לָשׂ֥וּם <WH7760> to put אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> there לְשִׁכְנ֥וֹ <WH7933> there [even] unto his habitation תִדְרְשׁ֖וּ <WH1875> shall ye seek וּבָ֥אתָ <WH935> and thither thou shalt come שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> and there

וַהֲבֵאתֶ֣ם <WH935> And thither ye shall bring שָׁ֗מָּה <WH8033> There עֹלֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <WH5930> your burnt offerings וְזִבְחֵיכֶ֔ם <WH2077> and your sacrifices וְאֵת֙ <WH853> מַעְשְׂרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH4643> and your tithes וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> תְּרוּמַ֣ת <WH8641> and heave offerings יֶדְכֶ֑ם <WH3027> of your hand וְנִדְרֵיכֶם֙ <WH5088> and your vows וְנִדְבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5071> and your freewill offerings וּבְכֹרֹ֥ת <WH1062> and the firstlings בְּקַרְכֶ֖ם <WH1241> of your herds וְצֹאנְכֶֽם׃ <WH6629> and of your flocks

וַאֲכַלְתֶּם־ <WH398> And there ye shall eat שָׁ֗ם <WH8033> There לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> your God וּשְׂמַחְתֶּ֗ם <WH8055> and ye shall rejoice בְּכֹל֙ <WH3605> all מִשְׁלַ֣ח <WH4916> in all that ye put יֶדְכֶ֔ם <WH3027> your hand אַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> you וּבָתֵּיכֶ֑ם <WH1004> unto ye and your households אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בֵּֽרַכְךָ֖ <WH1288> hath blessed יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> wherein the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> thy God

לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תַעֲשׂ֔וּן <WH6213> Ye shall not do כְּ֠כֹל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> what אֲנַ֧חְנוּ <WH587> we עֹשִׂ֛ים <WH6213> after all [the things] that we do פֹּ֖ה <WH6311> here הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> here this day אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> every man כָּל־ <WH3605> whatever הַיָּשָׁ֥ר <WH3477> whatsoever [is] right בְּעֵינָֽיו׃ <WH5869> in his own eyes

כִּ֥י <WH3588> for לֹא־ <WH3808> not בָּאתֶ֖ם <WH935> For ye are not as yet come עַד־ <WH5704> as עָ֑תָּה <WH6258> yet אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמְּנוּחָה֙ <WH4496> to the rest וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to הַֽנַּחֲלָ֔ה <WH5159> and to the inheritance אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יְהוָ֥ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> your God נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> giveth לָֽךְ׃

וַעֲבַרְתֶּם֮ <WH5674> But [when] ye go over אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּן֒ <WH3383> Jordan וִֽישַׁבְתֶּ֣ם <WH3427> and dwell בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> in the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <WH430> your God מַנְחִ֣יל <WH5157> giveth you to inherit אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> וְהֵנִ֨יחַ <WH5117> and [when] he giveth you rest לָכֶ֧ם מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all אֹיְבֵיכֶ֛ם <WH341> from all your enemies מִסָּבִ֖יב <WH5439> round about וִֽישַׁבְתֶּם־ <WH3427> so that ye dwell בֶּֽטַח׃ <WH983> in safety

וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> shall come הַמָּק֗וֹם <WH4725> Then there shall be a place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יִבְחַר֩ <WH977> shall choose יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֥ם <WH430> your God בּוֹ֙ לְשַׁכֵּ֤ן <WH7931> to dwell שְׁמוֹ֙ <WH8034> to cause his name שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> there שָׁ֣מָּה <WH8033> there תָבִ֔יאוּ <WH935> there thither shall ye bring אֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I מְצַוֶּ֣ה <WH6680> all that I command אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> עוֹלֹתֵיכֶ֣ם <WH5930> you your burnt offerings וְזִבְחֵיכֶ֗ם <WH2077> and your sacrifices מַעְשְׂרֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <WH4643> your tithes וּתְרֻמַ֣ת <WH8641> and the heave offering יֶדְכֶ֔ם <WH3027> of your hand וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> and all מִבְחַ֣ר <WH4005> and all your choice נִדְרֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5088> vows אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which תִּדְּר֖וּ <WH5087> which ye vow לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וּשְׂמַחְתֶּ֗ם <WH8055> And ye shall rejoice לִפְנֵי֮ <WH6440> before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֒ <WH430> your God אַתֶּ֗ם <WH859> you וּבְנֵיכֶם֙ <WH1121> ye and your sons וּבְנֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1323> and your daughters וְעַבְדֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5650> and your menservants וְאַמְהֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH519> and your maidservants וְהַלֵּוִי֙ <WH3881> and the Levite אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בְּשַֽׁעֲרֵיכֶ֔ם <WH8179> that [is] within your gates כִּ֣י <WH3588> forasmuch אֵ֥ין <WH369> has ל֛וֹ חֵ֥לֶק <WH2506> as he hath no part וְנַחֲלָ֖ה <WH5159> nor inheritance אִתְּכֶֽם׃ <WH854> for

הִשָּׁ֣מֶר <WH8104> Take heed לְךָ֔ פֶּֽן־ <WH6435> not תַּעֲלֶ֖ה <WH5927> to thyself that thou offer עֹלֹתֶ֑יךָ <WH5930> not thy burnt offerings בְּכָל־ <WH3605> every מָק֖וֹם <WH4725> in every place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> you תִּרְאֶֽה׃ <WH7200> that thou seest

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but בַּמָּק֞וֹם <WH4725> But in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יִבְחַ֤ר <WH977> shall choose יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> which the LORD בְּאַחַ֣ד <WH259> in one שְׁבָטֶ֔יךָ <WH7626> of thy tribes שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there תַּעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> there thou shalt offer עֹלֹתֶ֑יךָ <WH5930> thy burnt offerings וְשָׁ֣ם <WH8033> and there תַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> and there thou shalt do כֹּ֛ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I מְצַוֶּֽךָּ׃ <WH6680> all that I command

רַק֩ <WH7535> within בְּכָל־ <WH3605> any אַוַּ֨ת <WH185> lusteth after נַפְשְׁךָ֜ <WH5315> whatsoever thy soul תִּזְבַּ֣ח ׀ <WH2076> Notwithstanding thou mayest kill וְאָכַלְתָּ֣ <WH398> and eat בָשָׂ֗ר <WH1320> flesh כְּבִרְכַּ֨ת <WH1293> according to the blessing יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <WH430> thy God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נָֽתַן־ <WH5414> which he hath given לְךָ֖ בְּכָל־ <WH3605> whatever שְׁעָרֶ֑יךָ <WH8179> in all thy gates הַטָּמֵ֤א <WH2931> thee the unclean וְהַטָּהוֹר֙ <WH2889> and the clean יֹאכְלֶ֔נּוּ <WH398> may eat כַּצְּבִ֖י <WH6643> thereof as of the roebuck וְכָאַיָּֽל׃ <WH354> and as of the hart

רַ֥ק <WH7535> but הַדָּ֖ם <WH1818> the blood לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תֹאכֵ֑לוּ <WH398> Only ye shall not eat עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> it upon the earth תִּשְׁפְּכֶ֖נּוּ <WH8210> ye shall pour כַּמָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> as water

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> are not תוּכַ֞ל <WH3201> Thou mayest לֶאֱכֹ֣ל <WH398> not eat בִּשְׁעָרֶ֗יךָ <WH8179> within thy gates מַעְשַׂ֤ר <WH4643> the tithe דְּגָֽנְךָ֙ <WH1715> of thy corn וְתִֽירֹשְׁךָ֣ <WH8492> or of thy wine וְיִצְהָרֶ֔ךָ <WH3323> or of thy oil וּבְכֹרֹ֥ת <WH1062> or the firstlings בְּקָרְךָ֖ <WH1241> of thy herds וְצֹאנֶ֑ךָ <WH6629> or of thy flock וְכָל־ <WH3605> any נְדָרֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5088> nor any of thy vows אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which תִּדֹּ֔ר <WH5087> which thou vowest וְנִדְבֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH5071> nor thy freewill offerings וּתְרוּמַ֥ת <WH8641> or heave offering יָדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3027> of thine hand

כִּ֡י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> them לִפְנֵי֩ <WH6440> them before יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <WH430> thy God תֹּאכְלֶ֗נּוּ <WH398> But thou must eat בַּמָּקוֹם֙ <WH4725> in the place אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יִבְחַ֜ר <WH977> shall choose יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶיךָ֮ <WH430> thy God בּוֹ֒ אַתָּ֨ה <WH859> you וּבִנְךָ֤ <WH1121> thou and thy son וּבִתֶּ֙ךָ֙ <WH1323> and thy daughter וְעַבְדְּךָ֣ <WH5650> and thy manservant וַאֲמָתֶ֔ךָ <WH519> and thy maidservant וְהַלֵּוִ֖י <WH3881> and the Levite אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בִּשְׁעָרֶ֑יךָ <WH8179> that [is] within thy gates וְשָׂמַחְתָּ֗ <WH8055> and thou shalt rejoice לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all מִשְׁלַ֥ח <WH4916> in all that thou puttest יָדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3027> thine hands

הִשָּׁ֣מֶר <WH8104> Take heed לְךָ֔ פֶּֽן־ <WH6435> not תַּעֲזֹ֖ב <WH5800> to thyself that thou forsake אֶת־ <WH853> הַלֵּוִ֑י <WH3881> not the Levite כָּל־ <WH3605> you יָמֶ֖יךָ <WH3117> as long as thou livest עַל־ <WH5921> in אַדְמָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH127> upon the earth ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When יַרְחִיב֩ <WH7337> shall enlarge יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> When the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֥יךָ <WH430> thy God אֶֽת־ <WH853> גְּבֽוּלְךָ֮ <WH1366> thy border כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he דִּבֶּר־ <WH1696> as he hath promised לָךְ֒ וְאָמַרְתָּ֙ <WH559> thee and thou shalt say אֹכְלָ֣ה <WH398> I will eat בָשָׂ֔ר <WH1320> flesh כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When תְאַוֶּ֥ה <WH183> longeth נַפְשְׁךָ֖ <WH5315> because thy soul לֶאֱכֹ֣ל <WH398> to eat בָּשָׂ֑ר <WH1320> flesh בְּכָל־ <WH3605> whatever אַוַּ֥ת <WH185> lusteth after נַפְשְׁךָ֖ <WH5315> whatsoever thy soul תֹּאכַ֥ל <WH398> thou mayest eat בָּשָֽׂר׃ <WH1320> flesh

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If יִרְחַ֨ק <WH7368> there be too far מִמְּךָ֜ <WH4480> at הַמָּק֗וֹם <WH4725> If the place אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יִבְחַ֜ר <WH977> hath chosen יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶיךָ֮ <WH430> thy God לָשׂ֣וּם <WH7760> to put שְׁמ֣וֹ <WH8034> his name שָׁם֒ <WH8033> in it וְזָבַחְתָּ֞ <WH2076> from thee then thou shalt kill מִבְּקָרְךָ֣ <WH1241> of thy herd וּמִצֹּֽאנְךָ֗ <WH6629> and of thy flock אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which נָתַ֤ן <WH5414> hath given יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> which the LORD לְךָ֔ כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which צִוִּיתִ֑ךָ <WH6680> thee as I have commanded וְאָֽכַלְתָּ֙ <WH398> thee and thou shalt eat בִּשְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <WH8179> in thy gates בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> whatever אַוַּ֥ת <WH185> lusteth after נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH5315> whatsoever thy soul

אַ֗ךְ <WH389> also כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after יֵאָכֵ֤ל <WH398> is eaten אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַצְּבִי֙ <WH6643> Even as the roebuck וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣אַיָּ֔ל <WH354> and the hart כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> so תֹּאכְלֶ֑נּוּ <WH398> so thou shalt eat הַטָּמֵא֙ <WH2931> them the unclean וְהַטָּה֔וֹר <WH2889> and the clean יַחְדָּ֖ו <WH3162> [of] them alike יֹאכְלֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH398> shall eat

רַ֣ק <WH7535> but חֲזַ֗ק <WH2388> Only be sure לְבִלְתִּי֙ <WH1115> not אֲכֹ֣ל <WH398> that thou eat הַדָּ֔ם <WH1818> not the blood כִּ֥י <WH3588> for הַדָּ֖ם <WH1818> for the blood ה֣וּא <WH1931> he הַנָּ֑פֶשׁ <WH5315> [is] the life וְלֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תֹאכַ֥ל <WH398> and thou mayest not eat הַנֶּ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> the life עִם־ <WH5973> with הַבָּשָֽׂר׃ <WH1320> with the flesh
לֹ֖א <WH3808> shall not תֹּאכְלֶ֑נּוּ <WH398> Thou shalt not eat עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> it upon the earth תִּשְׁפְּכֶ֖נּוּ <WH8210> it thou shalt pour כַּמָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> as water

לֹ֖א <WH3808> shall not תֹּאכְלֶ֑נּוּ <WH398> Thou shalt not eat לְמַ֨עַן <WH4616> so יִיטַ֤ב <WH3190> it that it may go well לְךָ֙ וּלְבָנֶ֣יךָ <WH1121> with thee and with thy children אַחֲרֶ֔יךָ <WH310> after כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for תַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> thee when thou shalt do הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <WH3477> [that which is] right בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

רַ֧ק <WH7535> but קָֽדָשֶׁ֛יךָ <WH6944> Only thy holy things אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יִהְי֥וּ <WH1961> may have לְךָ֖ וּנְדָרֶ֑יךָ <WH5088> which thou hast and thy vows תִּשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> thou shalt take וּבָ֔אתָ <WH935> and go אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> unto the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יִבְחַ֥ר <WH977> shall choose יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> which the LORD

וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt offer עֹלֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5930> thy burnt offerings הַבָּשָׂ֣ר <WH1320> the flesh וְהַדָּ֔ם <WH1818> and the blood עַל־ <WH5921> on מִזְבַּ֖ח <WH4196> upon the altar יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God וְדַם־ <WH1818> and the blood זְבָחֶ֗יךָ <WH2077> of thy sacrifices יִשָּׁפֵךְ֙ <WH8210> shall be poured out עַל־ <WH5921> on מִזְבַּח֙ <WH4196> upon the altar יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God וְהַבָּשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> the flesh תֹּאכֵֽל׃ <WH398> and thou shalt eat

שְׁמֹ֣ר <WH8104> Observe וְשָׁמַעְתָּ֗ <WH8085> and hear אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> to all הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> all these words הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I מְצַוֶּ֑ךָּ <WH6680> which I command לְמַעַן֩ <WH4616> so יִיטַ֨ב <WH3190> thee that it may go well לְךָ֜ וּלְבָנֶ֤יךָ <WH1121> with thee and with thy children אַחֲרֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH310> after עַד־ <WH5704> thee for עוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> ever כִּ֤י <WH3588> for תַעֲשֶׂה֙ <WH6213> when thou doest הַטּ֣וֹב <WH2896> [that which is] good וְהַיָּשָׁ֔ר <WH3477> and right בְּעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> thy God ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When יַכְרִית֩ <WH3772> shall cut off יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> When the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <WH430> thy God אֶת־ <WH853> הַגּוֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> the nations אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you בָא־ <WH935> thee whither thou goest שָׁ֛מָּה <WH8033> in לָרֶ֥שֶׁת <WH3423> to possess אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> מִפָּנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> from before וְיָרַשְׁתָּ֣ <WH3423> them and thou succeedest אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> וְיָשַׁבְתָּ֖ <WH3427> them and dwellest בְּאַרְצָֽם׃ <WH776> in their land

הִשָּׁ֣מֶר <WH8104> Take heed לְךָ֗ פֶּן־ <WH6435> you are not תִּנָּקֵשׁ֙ <WH5367> to thyself that thou be not snared אַחֲרֵיהֶ֔ם <WH310> by following אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> them after הִשָּׁמְדָ֣ם <WH8045> that they be destroyed מִפָּנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> from before וּפֶן־ <WH6435> not תִּדְרֹ֨שׁ <WH1875> thee and that thou enquire לֵֽאלֹהֵיהֶ֜ם <WH430> not after their gods לֵאמֹ֨ר <WH559> saying אֵיכָ֨ה <WH349> how יַעַבְד֜וּ <WH5647> serve הַגּוֹיִ֤ם <WH1471> How did these nations הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> these אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ם <WH430> their gods וְאֶעֱשֶׂה־ <WH6213> may do כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> after that גַּם־ <WH1571> likewise אָֽנִי׃ <WH589> I

לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> Thou shalt not do כֵ֔ן <WH3651> thus לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> so unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God כִּי֩ <WH3588> for כָּל־ <WH3605> every תּוֹעֲבַ֨ת <WH8441> for every abomination יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> to the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which שָׂנֵ֗א <WH8130> which he hateth עָשׂוּ֙ <WH6213> have they done לֵאלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ם <WH430> unto their gods כִּ֣י <WH3588> for גַ֤ם <WH1571> even אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵיהֶם֙ <WH1121> for even their sons וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֹ֣תֵיהֶ֔ם <WH1323> and their daughters יִשְׂרְפ֥וּ <WH8313> they have burnt בָאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> in the fire לֵֽאלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH430> to their gods

אֵ֣ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> What הַדָּבָ֗ר <WH1697> What thing אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after אָנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I מְצַוֶּ֣ה <WH6680> soever I command אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> אֹת֥וֹ <WH853> תִשְׁמְר֖וּ <WH8104> you observe לַעֲשׂ֑וֹת <WH6213> to do לֹא־ <WH3808> to nor תֹסֵ֣ף <WH3254> it thou shalt not add עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> unto וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor תִגְרַ֖ע <WH1639> thereto nor diminish מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> at פ
